limit.title: Limit
limit.markdownDescription: The maximum number of items that the merchant can select. The default limit, and the maximum limit you can set, is 50.

options.title: Select Options
options.markdownDescription: Takes an array of value/label definitions for each option in the drop-down

defaultSnippets.label: Options
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: Takes an array of value/label definitions for each option in the drop-down.

defaultSnippets.label: Options with group
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: Takes an array of value/label definitions for each option in the drop-down with an optional attribute you can add to each option to create option groups in the drop-down

value.markdownDescription: The value of the select options. This will be used as the output

label.title: Label
label.markdownDescription: A label to render to the theme editor

group.title: Group
group.markdownDescription: An optional attribute you can add to each option to create option groups in the drop-down.

step.title: Step
step.markdownDescription: The step refers to the step count for the slider values. For example, if you set the step to 5, then the range slider will count by fives. By default, the step is set to 1.

unit.title: Unit
unit.markdownDescription: The unit of measure label. For example, you could use sec for seconds, or px for pixels.

options.title: Radio Options
options.markdownDescription: Takes an array of value/label definitions

accept.title: Accept
accept.markdownDescription: Takes an array of accepted video providers. Valid values are youtube, vimeo, or both

name.title: Block Name
name.markdownDescription: The block name which is used as the merchants label

type.title: Block Type
type.markdownDescription: A block's type may be any value set by the theme developer.

limit.title: Limit
limit.markdownDescription: By default, a merchant can add the same block to a section multiple times. If required, you can set a limit for a block so that it can only be added up to a certain number of times.

name.title: Name
name.markdownDescription: The default name, which will show in the Add section portion of the theme editor.

settings.title: Settings
settings.markdownDescription: A list of default values for any settings you might want to populate. Each entry should include the setting name and the value.

blocks.markdownDescription: A list of default blocks that you might want to include. Each entry should be an object with attributes of type and settings. The type attribute value should reflect the type of the block that you want to include, and the settings object should be in the same format as the settings attribute above.

name.title: Name
name.markdownDescription: The preset name, which will show in the Add section portion of the theme editor.

settings.title: Settings
settings.markdownDescription: A list of default values for any settings you might want to populate. Each entry should include the setting name and the value.

blocks.markdownDescription: A list of default blocks that you might want to include. Each entry should be an object with attributes of type and settings. The type attribute value should reflect the type of the block that you want to include, and the settings object should be in the same format as the settings attribute above.

templates.title: Templates
templates.markdownDescription: A list of the template page types where the section can be used.

groups.title: Groups
groups.markdownDescription: A list of the section groups where the section can be used.

templates.title: Templates
templates.markdownDescription: A list of the template page types where the section can't be used.

groups.title: Groups
groups.markdownDescription: A list of the section groups where the section can't be used.
